title: We Played Spider-Man! - Kinda Funny Games Impressions E3 2018
description:
Tim and Nick got to play Spider-man at E3 2018!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: we got to play insomniac ps4 spider-man and oh my god I cannot wait to play today it's been a good day it's really a good day yeah I went from playing spider-man to Smash Brothers to Resident Evil 2 you can hear our thoughts on all of those games going up over the next couple 1/2 hours this day let's talk about spider-man let's do it what do you think it's really fun it's really fun I mean it really is Batman Arkham Knight but with spider-man and it's a lot more fluid and you can swing faster and it's really that's the thing it's the mobility that I really obviously big spider-man fan so well I was like how fluid is the swinging gonna be is it gonna be a pain in the ass there's gonna be multiple controls or it's just gonna be one button make it easy and then have some fun that'll like you know you can hurt me shop yeah footnote the quick wedding shot yourself oh yeah things like that it's pretty seamless I I feel like he does a really good job constantly time in you what the what the
